content: Do you have moderation experience, whether here on Discord or within other online communities? Do you want an opportunity to be a leader in this awesome community! Reply to this thread and I will reach out to you via Discord DMs!
I mod several discord communities and facebook groups - I'd love some details?
DM'ed you
I too am I moderator for various Discord Communities and would like more information <@1257469301435400238>
DM'ed you!
I have extensive experience with volunteer work and with being an admin and mod on several Facebook groups. I am happy to help
I've modded on Twitch before and happy to help if needed.
I have mod experience and just onboarded as a Calls Team Mod.

Hi Frances. I'm trying to find out about next steps for being a Text Moderator. I was one in 2020. I took the training for it for this year and filled out required forms, etc. But I am not sure where to keep an eye out for next steps. Can you help? (I posted about this in text-team-welcome but it seems to have been removed?) Thanks!
Hi Katherine I appreciate you are excited to get started as a Text Mod. Text team will reach out, Please watch your DMs.
Thanks! I wasn't sure if I'd hear more via DM, a new channel, or another method. Helpful to know that it will be via DM. There's so much content on Discord it's hard to keep track!
Hi I‚Äôd love to learn more! I have discord experience (my own server) but no mod experience
I too would be interested to help if this server needs help (:
I would like to add my phone number but it says it is in use on a different discord server and to disconnect it. The problem is I've left the other servers. Any idea what I should do?
Hi <@816713323272732704> I sent you a Friend Request, you can see it by clicking the red dot in the upper-right, and from there we can work on this in the Direct Message space.
I have time to help but not any experience as a Mod.  I do have some ideas how a  less experienced Mod can help while learning.  I look forward to your DM. TY

I have extensive experience in running call centers, customer service and inside sales teams. How could I support as a moderator or helper? I would love to be able to help share guidance and tips to my fellow call bank team members -  however I am not too skilled with Discord. Thank you!
Hi Terry--sounds like you would be a good fit for the call moderator team. I would recommend going to <#1242256751445934262> and inquiring with those mods as to the process!
Thank you!  I will  check in there!

I don't have formal mod experience but have also ran a call center in my professional life. I have also managed a policy/procedure queue at my company - if employees had issues or didn't know how to proceed with a customer, or figure out if something was within the company policy  they'd reach out to me. Either by direct phone calls,  email, or an automated issue management queue. My responsibility was managing all 3 all day, full time üôÇ I signed up for the text mod training for Saturday, but happy to help where most needed if any area needs mods more than others.
Hi Frances, I‚Äôve taken the mod training and had a 1-on-1 with you as you already know, I just have a question about the shadow shift signup sheet
Hi, what‚Äôs up?
I sent the question in a dm

I may as well send it here as well; so all of the available slots for the shadow shifts either have a bit that says ‚Äúname here‚Äù or one that says ‚Äúunavailable for shadowing,‚Äù are the later ones not open slots and we can‚Äôt select them? As in they‚Äôre literally unavailable time slots and we have to select the former? Or are we allowed to select the latter as well?

Interested in being a server mod. I have call center job experience, as well as web design and supervisor de-escalation positions. I have been a super volunteer for other campaigns (Bernie 2016). Done phone banking for this campaign and waiting on verification to start texting.
Check DMs. üôÇ
